rows.name: Quantities 1 to 6

block1_text.eng: Use the standard dot patterns from dice for the quantities 1 to 6.

rows.name: One More – Under 10

block1_text.eng: Use a second color to emphasize the "one more" aspect of these. Using one color allows for more discussion and interpretations.

rows.name: Small Doubles

block1_text.eng: Sometimes use vertical ten frames to show the doubles.

rows.name: Misc. Dot Patterns

block1_text.eng: This will have many examples of more random patterns of dots. For example, 3,5,3; 3,3,3 shifted over; 3,4,5; etc. This is an important category for Notice and Wonder.
